concepts_learned.notes: Loop continues as long as condition is true

errors.description: Condition never becomes false - infinite loop

reflection.difficulty: Understanding when the loop condition is checked was initially confusing
reflection.success: I successfully corrected both errors without hints
reflection.strategy: Reading the code line by line and tracing variable values helped
reflection.transfer: I can apply this to any situation where I need repetition

sessions.notes: Good first session, clear progress on loop understanding

concepts_learned.notes: Catches errors without crashing the program
Occurs when converting invalid string to int

errors.description: except block not aligned with try block

reflection.difficulty: Remembering the exact indentation for try/except blocks
reflection.success: Error handling now makes sense - I understand why it's needed
reflection.strategy: Comparing with the example structure helped
reflection.transfer: I can use this anywhere users input data
reflection.next_focus: Combine loops and error handling in one program

sessions.notes: Excellent progress - achieved 2 error-free programs in a row
